Author: apocalyptic_thoughts
Text: I obviously can't know for sure, but I believe that the binge was triggered by your PMS; that your future period triggered the binge.   'SomeÂ research suggests that changes in the levels of the hormones estrogenÂ and progesteroneÂ cause cravings for foods rich inÂ carbohydratesÂ and sugars before a period.'
